A gold-plated donation box - Creating a donation box that turns donations into gold would encourage more people to donate, knowing that their contributions are potentially worth something.
A gold-plated recycling machine - This would increase the efficiency of recycling and the value of recycled materials, further encouraging environmentally friendly practices.
A gold-coated time machine - This would allow people to literally travel back in time and collect gold from historical events, which could then be used to further enrich the present.
A gold-coated tree - In a more literal sense, if a tree could be turned into gold, it could signify the value and importance of nature.

A gold-plated music instrument - By turning a simple, ordinary thing like a guitar or piano into gold, it would not only make it an incredibly profitable instrument but also symbolize the value of music and art.
